/** * Simple PDF Service * Generate PDF quotes using a simpler approach */export class SimplePDFService{static async downloadQuote(quoteData){try{// For now, create a simple text-based PDF const content=this.generateQuoteContent(quoteData);// Create a simple HTML content const htmlContent=" Quote ".concat(quoteData.id,"

INSTANT QUOTE BUILDER

Professional Moving Services

Customer Information

Name: ").concat(quoteData.customerName,"

Email: ").concat(quoteData.customerEmail,"

Move Date: ").concat(quoteData.moveDate,"

Move Details

From: ").concat(quoteData.originAddress,"

To: ").concat(quoteData.destinationAddress,"

Inventory

").concat(this.generateInventoryHTML(quoteData.detections),"
").concat(quoteData.upsells.filter(u=>u.selected).length>0?"

Additional Services

".concat(quoteData.upsells.filter(u=>u.selected).map(upsell=>"
".concat(upsell.name,": $").concat(upsell.price.toFixed(2),"
")).join(''),"
"):'',"
Total: $").concat(quoteData.totalAmount.toFixed(2),"

This quote is valid for 30 days from the date of generation.

For support, contact us at support@instantquotebuilder.com

");// Create and download the HTML file (can be printed to PDF) const blob=new Blob([htmlContent],{type:'text/html'});const url=URL.createObjectURL(blob);const link=document.createElement('a');link.href=url;link.download="quote-".concat(quoteData.id,".html");document.body.appendChild(link);link.click();document.body.removeChild(link);URL.revokeObjectURL(url);}catch(error){console.error('Error generating PDF:',error);throw new Error('Failed to generate PDF');}}static generateQuoteContent(quoteData){let content="QUOTE ".concat(quoteData.id," ");content+="Instant Quote Builder - Professional Moving Services ";content+="Customer: ".concat(quoteData.customerName," ");content+="Email: ".concat(quoteData.customerEmail," ");content+="Phone: ".concat(quoteData.customerPhone," ");content+="Move Date: ".concat(quoteData.moveDate," ");content+="From: ".concat(quoteData.originAddress," ");content+="To: ".concat(quoteData.destinationAddress," ");content+="INVENTORY: ";// Group by room const grouped=quoteData.detections.reduce((groups,item)=>{const room=item.room||'Other';if(!groups[room])groups[room]=[];groups[room].push(item);return groups;},{});Object.entries(grouped).forEach(_ref=>{let[room,items]=_ref;content+=" ".concat(room,": ");items.forEach(item=>{content+=" - ".concat(item.label," (").concat(item.qty,"x)");if(item.size)content+=" - ".concat(item.size);content+=' ';});});const selectedUpsells=quoteData.upsells.filter(u=>u.selected);if(selectedUpsells.length>0){content+=" ADDITIONAL SERVICES: ";selectedUpsells.forEach(upsell=>{content+=" - ".concat(upsell.name,": $").concat(upsell.price.toFixed(2)," ");});}content+=" TOTAL: $".concat(quoteData.totalAmount.toFixed(2)," ");content+=" This quote is valid for 30 days from the date of generation.";return content;}static generateInventoryHTML(detections){const grouped=detections.reduce((groups,item)=>{const room=item.room||'Other';if(!groups[room])groups[room]=[];groups[room].push(item);return groups;},{});let html='';Object.entries(grouped).forEach(_ref2=>{let[room,items]=_ref2;html+="

".concat(room,"

");items.forEach(item=>{html+="
".concat(item.label," (").concat(item.qty,"x)");if(item.size)html+=" - ".concat(item.size);html+='
';});});return html;}}
